title: Limmys Premium Kids Arm Bands for Swimming – Safe & Comfy Armbands for Toddlers and Children Aged 1–6 Years – Soft, Durable Float Bands for Boys & Girls
features: DOUBLE THE SAFETY – BECAUSE NOTHING MATTERS MORE: Two independent air chambers mean double the protection. If one ever deflates, the other is there—keeping your little one safely afloat. So while they discover the joy of swimming, you can breathe easy knowing they’re always supported.

SAFETY FIRST (AND SECOND, AND THIRD): Made with medical-grade, hypoallergenic materials that exceed UK, EU, and US standards. These armbands are made for real-life swim time—lessons, laughter, and everything in between.
FEELS LIKE A HUG, STAYS LIKE A PROMISE: Snug, ergonomic fit that moves with your child—no slipping, no twisting. Just soft, skin-friendly comfort that lets them splash and play without distractions.
READY IN SECONDS, STRESS-FREE FOR YOU: Oversized child-safe valves make inflating fast and simple. No more huffing, puffing or fiddly clips—just quick setup and more time for fun.
SOFT ON SKIN, TOUGH ON ADVENTURE: From daily swims to salty holidays, these armbands are made to last. Gentle on delicate skin, yet durable enough to handle every splash, dive, and cannonball.
BRIGHT, BOLD & EASY TO SPOT: Vibrant colours make every swim a little more fun—and help you keep eyes on your little one, even from across the pool or beach.

TRUSTED BY PARENTS, LOVED BY KIDS: These aren’t just any arm bands. They’re thoughtfully designed to support your child’s swimming journey—offering real safety with real comfort, every step of the way.

DESIGNED WITH LOVE, MADE TO LAST: We’re proud to be a European brand that puts heart into every stitch. From our family to yours, we’re here to help your child feel safe, strong, and free in the water—every step of the way.

Our arm bands go through stringent safety checks. The testing company are independent from Limmys, and they follow all safety regulations issued by the EU, USA, and UK authorities. Certificates are only issued when all safety requirements are met. Why are Limmys designs different to others? Limmys is a forever evolving brand. We like to offer unique designs to our customers that are not otherwise available on the market. Being different gives our customers more choice. Why did Limmys choose these colours? The colours that we use have been specifically chosen to ensure that the wearer is visible when in the water. This makes the wearer easy to identify and enhances safety. What benefits do the arm bands give? The arm bands are an aid for kids who are learning to swim. They allow the wearer to improve their strokes and feel more confident in the water. A parent or guardian should be with young children at all times while they are learning to swim. Why should I choose the Limmys brand? Limmys is a premium brand whereby our primary focus is on quality, safety, and our customers. We know that the satisfaction of our customers is the key to building our brand, so no expense is spared when providing the best customer experience. LIMMYS ARM BANDS COLLECTION
